sumarize_req: The ITT website is a comprehensive travel platform providing detailed information on various tours categorized as Special, Japan, Asia, and Europe-Australia-America. It features company service overviews, featured tours, news, and promotions, alongside visa consultation for multiple countries. The site includes cultural articles, travel stories, and customer testimonials. Multiple contact options are available, including an online inquiry form, dedicated hotlines for individual, group, and visa services (persistently displayed), email, and office address. Each tour detail page offers a comprehensive day-by-day itinerary, highlights, service details (hotel, flights, meals), detailed pricing (inclusions/exclusions), images, guide information, and payment/cancellation policies.
